channel.title: Chrome doesn't like your forum and it's your fault
channel.description:
![Discuss___Bootstrapped_fm|690x48](upload://d2QkotMNa38PJtSXDqhQwfVkyQI.png)
Seriously, this is such a great forum I hate to see something that will scare away people. Time for Let's Encrypt guys!
offered with much love,
Cheers, Bob

item.title: Chrome doesn't like your forum and it's your fault

item.description:
As for me, the connection is displayed safe.

item.description:
It’s not only Chrome. Firefox displays the same fear mongering message.

Read full topic

item.title: Chrome doesn't like your forum and it's your fault
item.dc:creator: Bobwalsh
item.description:
Yes, it was clickbait-y But I did want to raise this issue because seeing an insecure site nowadays is rare - and it could put people here at risk.

Read full topic
item.source: Chrome doesn't like your forum and it's your fault

item.title: Chrome doesn't like your forum and it's your fault
item.dc:creator: scottw
item.description:
I agree this could frighten some people…but this certainly not the site owners fault.

Google blinding forcing SSL upon everyone isn’t the answer.

Then again, using Chrome isn’t the answer either.

Having said that, it is easy to setup now and where ever this site is hosted probably has it automated these days.

Read full topic
